rows.close_reason: Implemented typed cassette parser path, validated equivalence via full importer/tour tests, and captured post-change profile evidence.
rows.title: A4-1: typed cassette parser path to reduce parse-stage overhead

rows.close_reason: UTF-8 safe truncation with floor_char_boundary. 7 regression tests covering emoji, CJK, mixed, and boundary logic.
rows.title: BUG: Forensic lens truncation panics on UTF-8 boundaries

rows.close_reason: M3 complete: Agent Cassette importer with streaming parser, 5-type event mapping, synthesized marking, test fixture with provenance, 3 integration tests. 22 tests total (19 unit + 3 integration). Quality gates: fmt ✓, clippy ✓, 75 tests ✓. UBS: 0 critical. Risk assessment appended.
rows.title: M3: Agent Cassette importer v0.1

rows.close_reason: Agent Cassette JSONL parser implemented: parse_cassette() streaming parser, map_record(), map_payload(), parse_iso8601_ns(). 19 unit tests pass.
rows.title: M3.1: Agent Cassette JSONL format parser

rows.close_reason: Event type mapping: session_start→RunStart, session_end→RunEnd, tool_use→ToolCall, tool_result→ToolResult, error→Error, unknown→Generic(Tier B). Tested.
rows.title: M3.2: Event type mapping (Cassette → Vifei)

rows.close_reason: All cassette events marked synthesized=true (source_seq always synthesized). Event IDs from source id field when present, else synthesized as cassette:{seq}. Tested.
rows.title: M3.3: Synthesized field detection and marking

rows.close_reason: fixtures/small-session.jsonl (11 synthetic events) + fixtures/README.md (provenance, redaction status, coverage). Fully synthetic, no PII.
rows.title: M3.4: Test fixture with provenance README

rows.close_reason: 3 integration tests: full pipeline (fixture→parser→writer→readback→verify), empty input, single event. All pass.
rows.title: M3.5: Importer integration tests

rows.close_reason: Maintainer triage playbook added and linked
rows.title: COMM-5: maintainer triage and labeling playbook

covered_exact.rationale: Exact bead heading found in risk register.

covered_milestone_alias.rationale: No exact bead heading, but milestone heading exists (legacy style). Counts as covered for transitional compatibility.

covered_parent_rollup.rationale: Feature/program parent has child beads and all children are covered; parent bead may remain rollup-only.

exempt_program_meta.rationale: Program/track meta bead intentionally exempt from per-bead risk entry.

gap_requires_entry.rationale: Closed bead lacks acceptable evidence mapping and needs risk-register action.
